org.patrodyne.scripting.java
Class MemoryClassLoader

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ClassLoader
      java.security.SecureClassLoader
          java.net.URLClassLoader
              org.patrodyne.scripting.java.MemoryClassLoader

public final class MemoryClassLoader
extends URLClassLoader

An extension of URLClassLoader to store and load classes from memory.

This class loader is constructed with a map of class name and byte code pairs for in-memory loading.

Modified from the original to:

  • Format source.
  • Organize imports.
  • Parameterize raw types.

Author:
A. Sundararajan, Rick O'Sullivan

MemoryClassLoader

public MemoryClassLoader(Map<String,byte[]> memoryMap,
                         String classPath,
                         ClassLoader parentLoader)
Construct with class map, path and parent loader.

Parameters:
memoryMap - An in-memory map of class names and byte code.
classPath - Directories and jars for class loading.
parentLoader - The parent class loader for delegation.

Get a map of class names and byte code.

load

public Class<?> load(String className)
              throws ClassNotFoundException
Load a class by name from the memory class map.

Returns:
A class from the memory class map.
Throws:
ClassNotFoundException - When a class name cannot be found.

loadAll

public Iterable<Class<?>> loadAll()
                           throws ClassNotFoundException
Load all classes from the memory class map.

Returns:
A iterator for all classes in the memory class map.
Throws:
ClassNotFoundException - When a class name cannot be found.

findClass

protected Class<?> findClass(String className)
                      throws ClassNotFoundException
Find class by class name. If the class name is in the memory class map, the associated byte code is converted into a Class and returned; otherwise, the search is performed as a URLClassLoader.

Overrides:
findClass in class URLClassLoader
Returns:
A Class for the given class name.
Throws:
ClassNotFoundException
